text: sometimes all it takes to make something
a little bit special is adding one small
ingredient today I'm making a mango
parfait with ricotta and my special
ingredient is a little bit of lime zest
and some lime juice
and it really brightens the entire dish
and really brings it to life to start
off with you want to macerate your mango
just a little bit to bring out the
flavors so you can cut your mango I like
to do it right in the peel it's just the
way that I prefer to do it I cut down
around the seed and then I cut cross
hatch in the peel and then you can just
flip it up and then you cut it out I
have a bowl with a tablespoon of sugar
I'm just gonna add my mango right to
that bowl you want to make sure that
when you're using ingredients in recipes
that call for very few that they're of
highest quality so make sure you pick
your mangoes well smell them touch them
and buy them a couple days ahead of time
and give them a little chance to soften
at room temperature and get nice and
fragrant and juicy because you want
every ingredient in these simple dishes
to be impeccable it smells like the
tropics in here then just add a half a
teaspoon of grated lime zest or more
it's up to you it's a cheer taste the
scent of lime zest is really amazing
very often and a tablespoon of lime
juice you want to let this sit for about
15 minutes 30 minutes just so that the
juices come out the sugar will help pull
the juices of the mango out combined
with the lime juice and get it really
really yummy I mean you could eat it
right away but it does get better if it
sits for a little bit now you can make
your parfait it's not really a parfait
so much but that's a fancy name I guess
spoon some ricotta into your glass you
can do this in a bowl of course you can
sweeten it if you'd like to a little bit
of sugar in your ricotta but I don't
think it's necessary and mango should be
sweet enough
spoon some mango you can layer it if you
want to a little more ricotta no more
mango isn't that bright and pretty I
think it's totally a breakfast worth
waiting for
mmm so good oh my gosh it's so good you
have to try it
